#summary &gt character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesG

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesG G] > &gt

== Value ==

There are 5 variations of this entity:

  * `&GT;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/003e/index.htm U+0003E].
  * `&GT` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/003e/index.htm U+0003E].
  * `&Gt;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/226b/index.htm U+0226B].
  * `&gt;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/003e/index.htm U+0003E].
  * `&gt` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/003e/index.htm U+0003E].
